General.Name: Cathay Biotech Inc
General.Description: Cathay Biotech Inc., a bio-manufacturing technology company, researches, develops, produces, and sells bio-based materials in China and internationally. It offers biological long-chain diacids comprising sebacic acid and octadecanedioic acid; bio-based polyamides; and bio-based pentamethylene diamine. The products are used in various applications, including textiles, pharmaceuticals, perfumes, automobiles, electronic appliances, consumer goods, and other industries. It provides its products under the TERRYL and ECOPENT brands. Cathay Biotech Inc. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Ms. Huiqing  Zang
2.Title: VP, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
